item.title: Session One
item.description: Pre Session Information General Information Check out Mechanics and Rulings for new rules and changed rules. Any rule listed there overrides the Player Handbook or other sources.

item.title: Mechanics and Rulings
item.description: New Mechanics A main goal of this campaign for me is to keep DND as dynamic and creative as possible, so we will be experimenting with new mechanics to make the entire campaign as fun as ...

item.title: Veins Of Miridan
item.description: Welcome to the Veins of Miridan homepage! This document will act as a lore document, session history, item catalog, and creature catalog. Check below before each session for pre-session information and or announcements.
